body:
Captain Marvel

Just watched Captain Marvel and honestly…10/10 Perfect depiction of women in day-to-day life and in hero movies. Loved how the struggles she went through were realistic. Side-note: also loved how the shapeshifters weren’t inherently bad. How they had a motive, but it was for a good cause.

reblog.comment:
Captain Marvel

But I'll sure as hell take it
summary: After seeing Captain Marvel twice in one day and then thinking about it for hours, I really like the idea that Goose was...
body:
After seeing Captain Marvel twice in one day and then thinking about it for hours, I really like the idea that Goose was Mar-Vell’s pet cat/flerken? 

  • First off, Goose obviously thinks Mar-Vell is its pet. Who’s right? No one knows. 
  • But anyways. Carol and Fury get to the super classified project pegasus base and find this cat that’s actually an alien that’s been hanging around in there for an unspecified length of time
  • The cat then follows them around in the archives, to the point where I actually thought it might be a Skrull for a couple minutes my first time watching it
  • So why would a cat/flerken do this? I do like the assumption that Goose sees Carol and Fury and immediately thinks “ah yes, I like these humans and this one gives me pets, I’m going to follow them”, but also consider:
  • Mar-Vell finds Goose out in space like a solid decade ago and brings Goose to earth with her, knowing full well what Goose is. 
  • When Carol and Maria start working at project pegasus, Mar-Vell hands them cat treats to give to Goose, because that’s what you do when you want your cat to like people. It’s even more important when your cat can eat people. 
  • Mar-Vell dies, and no one can catch the cat to bring it to a pound. Not for lack of trying, of course. 
  • Honestly though it was probably low enough on their radar that the people overseeing what to do with Mar-Vell’s stuff gave up after like a year max
  • There were totally some soldiers that left out food when no one was looking
  • There’s also stuff that goes missing. It’s not enough for anyone to actually open up an investigation or anything. 
  • Anyways, six years pass, and Goose is just hanging around the lower tunnels when !!!!Person that gave treats!!! Follow and get more treats that HAVEN’T HAD IN YEARS. 

Long story short Mar-Vell is why Goose was on the base, and Goose remembers Carol enough to follow them around because Carol gave it treats.

summary: Just saw Captain Marvel and it's AMAZING!!! It's now my favorite marvel movie (which is a tough sport to earn)!!! Carol is so...
body: Just saw Captain Marvel and it’s AMAZING!!! It’s now my favorite marvel movie (which is a tough sport to earn)!!! Carol is so inspiring and powerful and badass and sweet and cute and caring and awesome and I just love her and the movie so much!!! She’s so inspiring and now I wanna be awesome like her!!

summary: One woman’s opinion about Captain Marvel vs Wonder Woman.
title: One woman’s opinion about Captain Marvel vs Wonder Woman.
body:
Gal Gadot respects all of Wonder Woman’s fans, she loves the character she is portraying and at every interview over the movie, she is positive and supportive. All while keeping her personal opinions and activism off of the Wonder Woman stage. 

Brie Larson clearly has a problem with certain demographics of Captain Marvel Fans. She takes every opportunity to complain about the industry and disrespects the same people who support her film. That makes both her and the film look very bad.

That is the difference between these two films. Nothing to do with gender, nothing to do with race and absolutely nothing about feminism. If Disney was smart, they’d recast the role and give the opportunity to an actress who will better appreciate it.

reblog.comment:

That is the difference between these two films. Nothing to do with gender, nothing to do with race and absolutely nothing about feminism. If Disney was smart, they’d recast the role and give the opportunity to an actress who will better appreciate it.
